description: Assesses advanced credit risk mitigation factors including guarantees, letters of credit, credit derivatives, and credit insurance, based on Comptroller's Handbook guidelines.

parameters.name: guideline_guarantee_assessment
parameters.defaultValue: Guarantor must display capacity and willingness. Agreement should be precise. Analyze guarantor's financials.

parameters.name: guideline_letter_of_credit_assessment
parameters.defaultValue: L/C from high-quality institution may prevent default. Evaluate conditions to draw. Irrevocable L/Cs are stronger.

parameters.name: guideline_credit_derivative_assessment
parameters.defaultValue: Most mitigate loss, not default. Check for basis risk, timing mismatch, materiality clause, counterparty risk.

parameters.name: guideline_credit_insurance_assessment
parameters.defaultValue: Check coverage limits, deductibles, exclusions, insurer's financial strength.

parameters.name: collateral_summary_str
parameters.description: Stringified summary of pledged collateral (type, valuation, LTV).

parameters.name: guarantee_details_str
parameters.description: Stringified details of any guarantees (guarantor, type, amount, conditions).

parameters.name: letter_of_credit_details_str
parameters.description: Stringified details of any L/Cs (issuer, amount, type - standby/irrevocable, conditions).

parameters.name: credit_derivative_details_str
parameters.description: Stringified details of any credit derivatives (type, protection seller, reference asset, potential risks).

parameters.name: credit_insurance_details_str
parameters.description: Stringified details of any credit insurance (insurer, coverage, terms).

parameters.name: borrower_default_status_str
parameters.description: Current default status or likelihood for the borrower.
